formalpara.title: Figure 8. Recombination of GFP-URA3-GFP into target sequence
formalpara.para: The (n50)-GFP-URA3-GFP-(n50) cassette is amplified from pCB182 and transformed into yeast carrying the bacterial shuttle vector pRS415 (containing the target sequence). The gene specific extensions (n50) flanking GFP-URA3-GFP direct homologous recombination between (n50)-GFP-URA3-GFP-(n50) and pRS415. Selection for vector recombinants is achieved by plating the cells in the absence of uracil and leucine. Adapted from Hawkins et al. (2003).
